snippet: Gary Gensler, the chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, calls for a new interest rate benchmark to replace Libor, in an op-ed article in The New York Times.
abstract: Gary Gensler, the chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, calls for a new interest rate benchmark to replace Libor, in an op-ed article in The New York Times.

headline.main: Gensler Calls for a New Rate Benchmark
